tool.name: Scanpy DiffusionMap
tool.command: ln -s '${input_obj_file}' input.h5 && PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8 scanpy-cli embed diffmap --n-comps ${n_comps} #if $use_graph --neighbors-key '${use_graph}' #end if #if $key_added --key-added '${key_added}' #end if $export_embed @INPUT_OPTS@ @OUTPUT_OPTS@

param.name: n_comps
param.label: Number of diffusion components to calculate

param.name: export_embed
param.label: Export embeddings as a tab-separated text table

param.name: use_graph
param.label: Name of the slot that holds the KNN graph

param.name: key_added
param.label: Additional suffix to the name of the slot to save the calculated diffusion map
